mapper.sql: ItemCode_Auto, ItemType, Num, ItemName, Memo, IsActive, Seq, V1, V2, A1
mapper.select:
declare @type int=#{itemType} BEGIN if(@type=111)--客户性质（公司性质） begin select num=0,typeName='==请选择==' union all select Num ,typeName=convert(varchar(4),Num)+'.'+ItemName from ItemCode where ItemType=111 end if(@type=140)--产业类别（资本行业） begin select Num ,typeName=convert(varchar(4),Num)+'.'+ItemName from ItemCode where ItemType=140 end if(@type=12223)--租车目的 begin select num=0,typeName='==请选择==' union all select Num ,typeName=convert(varchar(4),Num)+'.'+ItemName from ItemCode where ItemType=12223 end if(@type=12224)--担保条件 begin select num=0,typeName='==请选择==' union all select Num ,typeName=convert(varchar(4),Num)+'.'+ItemName from ItemCode where ItemType=12224 end if(@type=2030)--获取汇款类别 begin select 0 as Num,'==请选择=='as typeName union all select Num,ItemName from ItemCode where ItemType=2030 and num != 3 end
if(@type=132)--获取附件类别 begin select 0 as Num,'==请选择=='as typeName union all select Num,ItemName from ItemCode where ItemType=132 order by typeName end END
declare @incName varchar(50)=#{incName} begin select 0 as Inc_Auto,'==请选择=='as FName union all select Inc_Auto,FName from Inc where FName like '%'+@incName+'%' end
declare @condition bigint=#{incAuto} begin select 0 as accountAuto,'==请选择=='as accountName union all select Num,ItemName from ItemCode where ItemType=2031 and v1=@condition end
